::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod was still at IGL waiting or his opponets. It had been a long
wait. Suddenly images of tourtured bots and such flashed through his
mind. 
Then a voice spoke, "He's coming..." Then the images flashed again.
Hot Rod didn't know who this was from, but it easy to figure out that
someone was gunning for him.
